bug.author: roelofvandijk
bug.summary: Wrong link to spleeter-gpu.yaml in wiki (points to spleeter-cpu.yaml)
bug.description:
Site: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/1.-Installation>https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/1.-Installation</denchmark-link>
Issue: spleeter-gpu.yaml link should be <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/blob/master/conda/spleeter-gpu.yaml>https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/blob/master/conda/spleeter-gpu.yaml</denchmark-link> .
